availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew Jackson Lamb (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Nichols Lamb in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on December 20, 1841. Father of Durin Clark Lamb, Mary Lavina Lamb Cartwright, Pernicia Francis Lamb, Sarah M. Lamb. Married to Mary A. Johnson Lamb in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on June 9, 1853 in. Father of M. Eveline Lamb, Anne Eliza Lamb, Elizabeth “Betty” Lamb, Mollie M. Lamb, John Ellisworth Lamb, and Laura V. Lamb. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Princeton in 1860.
